long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By entering the token information of the github account, the pr on github can be managed in batches in this extended option page. You can batch synchronize the upstream warehouse changes to the branch where your pr is located, and you can also batch process pr submitted by some robots (such as dependabot)
